messages.content: Viva mein professor ne itne tough questions puche ki main answer nahi de paaya. Fail kar diya. Ab supplementary dena padega.
Tough questions aur answer nahi aa paye - fail hone ka wo moment humiliating raha hoga. Supplementary ki tension zyada hai ya embarrassment ki yaad?
I'm juggling part-time work and full-time studies. Exhausted all the time. Grades are slipping but I need the money.
Work aur studies dono - exhaustion permanent feel ho raha hoga. Grades slip kar rahe par money zaroori hai - wo helplessness tough hai yaar?
Semester khatam hone wala hai aur main already soch raha hoon next semester ka stress. Break mein bhi relax nahi kar paata.
Ek semester khatam bhi nahi hua aur next ka stress already start - break mein bhi peace nahi. Relax nahi kar paana chronic anxiety hai ya pattern dikha raha ki hamesha yahi hota hai?

hum 5 saal se long distance mein hain. ab ek hi city mein hain 6 mahine se. But ab bhi woh busy rehta, barely milte. thought tha same city mein sab better hoga but worse ho gaya. Lagta physical distance excuse tha, emotional distance real problem hai.

5 saal long distance survive kiya tumne hoping ki same city mein everything will fall into place, aur ab woh hope bhi toot raha kyunki physical proximity ne koi change nahi laaya. yaar, that realization - ki distance excuse tha, not reason - bohot dard deta hai. jab geography barrier nahi tha toh effort bhi nahi aaya means reluctance real hai, distance convenient scapegoat tha. you held on for years believing proximity would fix things. ab kya dekhna remaining hai tumhare liye to stay?

He flirts with other girls openly and says 'we're not exclusive, I never promised that'. But gets angry if I talk to other guys. Double standards clear hain but when I confront, he says I'm 'overreacting' and 'insecure'. Am I actually overthinking?

no, you're not overthinking - you're correctly identifying hypocrisy. woh freedom chahta hai but tumse loyalty expect karta hai, aur jab point out karo toh tumhe 'insecure' bol ke gaslight karta. that's textbook manipulation. rules uske liye alag, tumhare liye alag - and calling your valid reaction 'overreacting' is him avoiding accountability. trust your gut here. kya yeh pattern sirf flirting mein hai ya aur bhi areas mein different standards hain?
I got promoted but I feel like they made a mistake. Like everyone else deserved it more than me.

Hmm, that feeling of 'they made a mistake' is so heavy yaar. But let me ask you something - did you show up, work hard, deliver results? Because promotions don't happen by accident. What specifically makes you feel others deserved it more?
yaar exam mein achhe marks aaye par lagta hai fluke tha bas

arre sunn, fluke nahi hota repeatedly yaar. ek baar ho sakta hai luck, but agar consistently achha kar raha hai toh that's YOUR effort. par bata, kya specific doubt hai tujhe apne preparation ko lekar?
mujhe lagta hai main fraud hoon... sab sochte hain main smart hoon par andar se toh kuch nahi hai

yaar ye 'fraud' wali feeling bohot logon ko hoti hai jo actually capable hain. tu impostor syndrome feel kar raha hai - matlab tera brain tujhe convince kar raha hai ki tu fake hai, jabki reality different hai. bata na, kaunsi cheez pe sabse zyada doubt hota hai - work pe ya personal life mein?
